title: Who are career accelerators for?
text: Career accelerators are for individuals who want to quickly gain new skills and switch careers.

title: Is any prior knowledge or experience required?
text: No prior knowledge is required. All foundational concepts will be covered.

title: How are courses selected for career accelerators?
text: Courses are selected based on industry demand and skills required by employers.
